with menu_user as ( select author_id from tb_menuauth_dept where dept_code = #{deptCode} union select author_id from tb_menuauth_emp where empl_no = #{emplNo} ), menu_lev as ( select distinct len(m.menu_fullcode)-len(replace(m.menu_fullcode,'\','')) + 1 as lev , m.menu_id from tb_menu m ), menu_auth as ( select m.menu_id from menu_user u inner join tb_menu_auth a on u.author_id = a.author_id inner join tb_menuauth_map am on a.author_id = am.author_id inner join tb_menu m on am.menu_id = m.menu_id ), menu_tree as ( select distinct l.lev ,m.menu_id ,m.menu_name ,m.menu_id_up ,m.menu_fullcode ,m.menu_url ,m.sort_seq ,case when a.menu_id != '' then 'Y' else 'N' end as author_yn from tb_menu m inner join menu_lev l on m.menu_id = l.menu_id left join menu_auth a on m.menu_id = a.menu_id where m.usage_ind = 'Y' ), menu_list as ( select distinct m.lev ,m.menu_id ,m.menu_name ,m.menu_id_up ,m.menu_fullcode ,m.menu_url ,case when m.lev = 1 then ( select top(1) b.menu_id from menu_tree b where b.lev > 1 and b.menu_fullcode like concat(m.menu_id ,'%') and b.author_yn ='Y' order by b.sort_seq ) else null end as sub_author_menu_id ,m.author_yn ,m.sort_seq from menu_tree m WHERE m.menu_id_up = #{menuId} )
select a.lev ,a.menu_id ,a.menu_name ,a.menu_id_up ,a.menu_fullcode ,a.menu_url ,a.author_yn ,a.sub_author_menu_id ,a.sort_seq from menu_list a where author_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sort_seq
/*SELECT '000' AS menu_id , '메뉴' AS menu_name , '' AS menu_id_up , 1 AS sort_seq UNION ALL*/ SELECT menu_id , menu_name as text , menu_name , menu_id_up , sort_seq FROM tb_menu ORDER BY sort_seq;

SELECT a.menu_id , a.menu_name , a.menu_id_up , b.menu_name AS menu_id_up_name , a.menu_fullcode , CAST(len(a.menu_fullcode)-len(replace(a.menu_fullcode,'\','')) + 1 AS CHAR(100)) AS menu_level , a.menu_url , a.sort_seq , a.usage_ind , a.create_user , a.create_datetime , a.update_user , a.update_datetime FROM tb_menu a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_menu b ON a.menu_id_up = b.menu_id ORDER BY a.sort_seq
